title: Cannot serve Spacy model "Exception: No suitable flavor backend was found for the model."

labels.name: area/scoring
labels.description: MLflow Model server, model deployment tools, Spark UDFs

labels.name: priority/awaiting-more-evidence
labels.description: Lowest priority. Possibly useful, but not yet enough support to actually get it done.

body:
### Willingness to contribute
The MLflow Community encourages bug fix contributions. Would you or another member of your organization be willing to contribute a fix
for this bug to the MLflow code base?

- [ ] Yes. I can contribute a fix for this bug independently.
- [X] Yes. I would be willing to contribute a fix for this bug with guidance from the MLflow community.
- [ ] No. I cannot contribute a bug fix at this time.

### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**: 
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Ubuntu 16.04
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: binary
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: 1.8.0
- **Python version**: 3.6.9
- **npm version, if running the dev UI**: N/A
- **Exact command to reproduce**:
1) Load a spacy model from disk `nlp = spacy.load("path/to/model")`
2) Save Spacy as MLflow model to disk `mlflow.spacy.save_model(spacy_model=nlp, path="/path/to/saved/model")`
3) Loading the Spacy model works from code
`nlp2 = mlflow.spacy.load_model("path/to/model")`
4) However, `mlflow models serve -m /path/to/model` fails with stack trace below. It says that it cannot find suitable flavor backend.


### Describe the problem
Cannot serve Spacy model via cli.

### Other info / logs
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/bin/mlflow", line 8, in <module>
    sys.exit(cli())
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 829, in __call__
    return self.main(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 782, in main
    rv = self.invoke(ctx)
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1259, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1259, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1066, in invoke
    return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params)
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 610, in invoke
    return callback(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/models/cli.py", line 56, in serve
    install_mlflow=install_mlflow).serve(model_uri=model_uri, port=port,
  File "/home/dima/miniconda2/envs/basemodel/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/models/cli.py", line 167, in _get_flavor_backend
    raise Exception("No suitable flavor backend was found for the model.")
Exception: No suitable flavor backend was found for the model.
```
